item.title: Shop Error
item.dc:creator: @Crucius Crucius
item.description:
@Crucius wrote:

No it’s in the client.java[br][size=1]Posted on: August 11, 2007, 01:28:36 PM[/size][hr]Down to one error now

client.java:17229: cannot find symbol symbol : variable PutNPCCords location: class client PutNPCCords = true; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

Any suggestions? Cuz I’m lost for this one. Never incountered a “Cannot find symbol” error.

Read full topic
